```{r}
## R code 12.2
library(rethinking)
data(UCBadmit)
d <- UCBadmit
d$gid <- ifelse( d$applicant.gender=="male" , 1L , 2L )
dat <- list( A=d$admit , N=d$applications , gid=d$gid )
m12.1 <- ulam(
    alist(
        A ~ dbetabinom( N , pbar , theta ),
        logit(pbar) <- a[gid],
        a[gid] ~ dnorm( 0 , 1.5 ),
        transpars> theta <<- phi + 2.0,
        phi ~ dexp(1)
    ), data=dat , chains=4 )
```
